directions: Combine ice, 1/4 cup chocolate syrup, heavy cream, vodka, coffee-flavored liqueur, brown sugar, vanilla extract, cinnamon, espresso powder, and salt in a blender; blend until smooth.
Drizzle the inside of 4 glasses with 1 tablespoon chocolate syrup to make a decorative pattern; pour in mudslide to within 1 inch of the top.
title: Steve's Homemade Mudslide
